setupPage.title: Setup
setupPage.description: This will be the page where it lets designers, developers and product know how to import the project, the change log and all the goodies associated with bringing the component library into a project.

dataTableComponentPage.title: DataTable Component
dataTableComponentPage.description: This is a data grid component that will do lots of awesome things.

csvServicePage.title: CSV Service
csvServicePage.description: This service takes a collection and exports it to CSV
csvServicePage.testDescription: Test the CSV export, which will download a CSV file with randomly generated data.

pdfServicePage.title: PDF Service
pdfServicePage.description: This service takes a collection and exports it to PDF
pdfServicePage.testDescription: Test the PDF export, which will open a PDF file with randomly generated data.
